## utils.runAfterPageLoad() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> No longer provided by Blockly.
> 

Calls a function after the page has loaded, possibly immediately.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function runAfterPageLoad(fn: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | () =&gt; void | Function to run. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

Error Will throw if no global document can be found (e.g., Node.js).
